lines.text: Ben, it was a long walk out here and my feet are killing me. Will you take my boots off?

Montana Territory - 1866. They came from the South, headed for the goldfields... Ben and Clint Allison, lonely and desperate men. Riding away from a heartbreak memory of Gettysburg. Looking for a new life. A story of tall men - and long shadows.
[pointing to a lynched man dangling from a tree limb]
Looks like we're close to civilization.
There goes the only man I ever respected. He's what every boy thinks he's going to be when he grows up and wishes he had been when he's an old man.

[Eating rabbit cooked by Nella]
You sure give a honey and molassas flavor to this rabbit
That's not honey and molassas-that's just girl

[Spraying Nella with perfume]
When Senor Stark smells you... haha! Ooh la la senorita, he go *wild*... haha!
Then take it away, because I'm not much in the mood for runnin'!
Ah, you run a little and *then* you stop a little... and when you *want* Senor Stark to catch you, *then* you sit down in a big chair!
